00041 //
00042 // KviWindowListItem
00043 //
00044 // The base class for the WindowList items
00045 // this is the only interface to an item visible to external classes
00046 //
00047 
00048 class KVIRC_API KviWindowListItem
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         KviWindowListItem(KviWindow * wnd);
00052         virtual ~KviWindowListItem();
00053 protected:
00054         KviWindow * m_pWindow;
00055         int         m_iHighlightLevel;
00056         int         m_iProgress;
00057 public:
00058         KviWindow * kviWindow(){ return m_pWindow; };
00059         virtual void captionChanged(){};
00060         virtual void highlight(int){};
00061         virtual void setProgress(int){};
00062         virtual bool active(){ return false; };
00063         virtual void unhighlight(){};
00064         int progress(){ return m_iProgress; };
00065         int highlightLevel(){ return m_iHighlightLevel; };
00066 };
00067 
00068 //
00069 // KviWindowListBase
00070 //
00071 // The base class for the WindowList implementations
00072 // This is the basic interface that all the external classes should see
00073 //
00074 
00075 class KVIRC_API KviWindowListBase : public QDockWidget
00076 {
00077         Q_OBJECT
00078 public:
00079         KviWindowListBase();
00080         virtual ~KviWindowListBase();
00081 protected:
00082         KviMainWindow * m_pFrm;
00083         QTimer   * m_pActivityMeterTimer;
00084         QWidget  * m_pTitleWidget;
00085         Qt::DockWidgetArea currentArea;
00086 public:
00087         virtual KviWindowListItem * addItem(KviWindow *){ return 0; };
00088         virtual bool removeItem(KviWindowListItem *){ return false; };
00089         virtual void setActiveItem(KviWindowListItem *){};
00090         virtual KviWindowListItem * firstItem(){ return 0; };
00091         virtual KviWindowListItem * lastItem(void) { return 0; }
00092         virtual KviWindowListItem * nextItem(){ return 0; };
00093         virtual KviWindowListItem * prevItem(void) { return 0; }
00094         virtual KviWindowListItem * item(int number);
00095         virtual bool setIterationPointer(KviWindowListItem *){ return false; };
00096         virtual void switchWindow(bool bNext,bool bInContextOnly,bool bHighlightedOnly=false);
00097         virtual void updatePseudoTransparency(){};
00098         virtual void applyOptions();
00099         virtual void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *e);
00100         static void getTextForConsole(QString &szText,KviConsoleWindow * pConsole);
00101         Qt::DockWidgetArea currentDockArea() { return currentArea; };
00102 protected slots:
00103         virtual void updateActivityMeter();
00104         void updateDockLocation(Qt::DockWidgetArea newArea);
00105 };
